name: Crystal Jar
description: Use a Crystal Jar after defeating the Shatterer in Blazeridge Steppes to fill it with essence.

name: Oiled Gossamer Helm Padding
description: Used to craft Gossamer Helms.

name: Bat Mother Cache
description: Double-click to gain Champion Bags, Dragonite Ore, Empyreal Fragments, Ley-Line Crystals, a Vial of Chak Acid, and other gear.

name: Recipe: Vigilant Exalted Coat
description: A recipe to make a Vigilant Exalted Coat.

name: Maklain's Wand
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the famous minstrel, Maklain.</c>

details.name: Nourishment
details.description:
-10% Incoming Damage
+70 Toughness
+10% Experience from Kills

name: Ascalonian Pillar
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Box of Recipes: Dusk
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Dusk.

name: Yassith's Epaulets
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the Forgotten, Sariss Yassith.</c>

name: Minstrel's Intricate Gossamer Insignia
description: Used in the crafting of armor with +Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality.

name: Recipe: Tizlak's Brazier
description: A recipe to make an ascended torch with Commander's (+Power, +Precision, +Toughness, and +Concentration) stats.

name: Recipe: Vile Jar
description: Learn to craft a glass jar infused with piles of vile essence.

name: Vial of Green Goo
description:
This vial of goo smells awful.
When you hold it, you get a tingling feeling that reminds you of the Mystic Forge.

name: Veldrunner Cloth Breather
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the ancient Elonian centaur pride, the Veldrunner.</c>

name: Ossa's Breeches
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the famous ruler, Turai Ossa.</c>

name: Gift of Totems
description: Purchase this recipe from Miyani.

name: Gift of Maguuma Mastery
description: A gift used to create legendary weapons.

name: Recipe: Yassith's Greaves
description: A recipe to make ascended heavy boots with Viper's (+Condition Damage, +Power, +Expertise, and +Precision) stats.

name: Oiled Gossamer Glove Panel
description: Used to craft Gossamer Gloves.

name: Grizzlemouth's Fighting Techniques
description: Sold by Lakor Grizzlemouth in Butcher's Block.

name: Recipe: Chiaroscuro Greatswords
description:
Unlocks the following recipes:
• Shimmering Greatsword
• Tenebrous Greatsword

name: Stabilizing Matrix
description: Found in Chests of the Mists and salvaged from ascended rings. Used to stabilize dark energy for the safe construction of items. Can also be traded for Fractal Encryptions.

name: Risen Krait Talisman
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Upper Bound
description: Return to Kelvei in the Fractals of the Mists to find out how to upgrade this item.

name: Balanced Nightsword Hilt
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: Fang of the vinetooth, found in Auric Basin.

description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

description: Salvaging ascended weapons has a chance to yield this item.

description: A recipe to make an ascended trident with Viper's (+Condition Damage, +Power, +Expertise, and +Precision) stats.

name: Svaard's Short Bow
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the famous mercenary, Grymm Svaard.</c>

name: Attuned Ouroboros Loop (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

buff.description:
+32 Condition Damage
+18 Precision

name: +5% Gold from Kills Banner
description: Spawns a guild banner that will give a +5% boost to gold earned from monster kills for any ally that touches it for 30 minutes. Does not stack with other gold banners.

name: Friendly Mushroom Spirit
description: Found on mushrooms in the Heart of Maguuma.

description: Used in the crafting of weapons with +Toughness, +Condition Damage, +Expertise, and +Vitality.

name: Recipe: Ornate Guild Jerkin

name: Endless Mushroom Queen Tonic
description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Maklain's Minstrel's Inscription
description: Used in the crafting of weapons with +Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality.

name: Exalted Energy
description: Double-click to combine the Exalted Energy with the Ley-Line Hub Energy, Ley-Line Stream Energy, and Ley-Line Font Energy.

description: Hold in inventory while communing with a krait altar to capture its animus.

name: Bottled Stormwind

description: Earn a Mastery point the first time you reach this tier.

description: Unlocks the collection Ad Infinitum III: Unbound.

name: Mini Gamli
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Agonized Essence
description:
Use in the Mystic Forge with an Agony Infusion, an Ascended Ring, and a Philosopher's Stone to craft an Attuned Ascended Ring.
Can be bought inside the Fractals of the Mists once you have trained Agony Channeler in the Fractal Attunement Mastery line.
